feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 6:30 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: SW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 except minus 4 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8 except minus 4 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain showers in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022
